description:
The King James Version Holy Bible.

Discover a seamless and intuitive journey through the sacred scriptures with our iOS Bible application. Designed with simplicity and ease of use in mind, our app features a clean and user-friendly interface that makes navigating the Bible effortless.

Immersive Audio Experience: Engage with the scriptures like never before with our integrated Audio Bible, bringing the words to life as you listen.
Powerful Search Functionality: Effortlessly find passages within a page or across the entire Bible with our comprehensive search feature.

Adaptable Reading Modes: Switch between day and night modes to ensure comfortable reading in any lighting condition.

Personalized Highlights: Mark significant verses with customizable highlight colors, making it easy to return to your favorite passages.

Daily Bible Verses: Start your day with inspiration. Receive daily Bible verses at your preferred time, keeping you connected and uplifted.

Universal Compatibility: Enjoy a seamless experience across devices, with full support for both iPhone and iPad.

Convenient Home Screen Widget: Stay connected with scripture through our home screen widget, offering quick access to key features right from your homepage.
Tailored Reading Experience: Customize your reading experience with adjustable font types, sizes, and backgrounds, along with additional personalization options to suit your reading preferences.

Embark on a spiritual journey with the scriptures at your fingertips, designed to enrich your faith and daily life.

Talkpal AI is a GPT-powered language learning app that helps millions of learners speak, listen, read and write more confidently in a new language.
Practise realistic conversations with advanced AI voice and chat, and learn 80+ languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, Korean and more.

WHY CHOOSE TALKPAL?
- GPT-based conversational AI for interactive, adaptive learning
- Learn faster through real speaking practice — not rote memorisation
- 80+ supported languages with dynamic difficulty
- Free to download, with some features available at no cost

TRUSTED BY MILLIONS OF USERS WORLDWIDE
Join 5,000,000+ language learners speaking confidently in over 80+ languages, including English, Spanish, German, French, Italian, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Arabic, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Hebrew, Greek, Turkish, Finnish and Afrikaans, Albanian, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Burmese, Cantonese, Catalan, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Estonian, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Lao, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Norwegian, Odia, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Swahili, Tagalog, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Zulu and more.

WHAT YOU GET WITH TALKPAL
Start speaking from day one with bite-sized lessons. Practise with immersive AI language learning modes designed to build real fluency and boost your speaking skills:
1. Chat Mode: Talk with a GPT-powered personal language tutor
2. Word Mode: Learn core vocabulary and polish your pronunciation
3. Sentence Mode: Strengthen grammar and sentence structure
4. Dialogue Mode: Practise daily phrases with pre-scripted conversations
5. Call Mode: Audio-only speaking practice for fluency and confidence
6. Roleplays: Real-life scenarios (travel, work, dating and more)
7. Characters: Engage in dynamic conversations with famous figures
8. Debates: Discuss topics to build logic and spontaneous speech

SKILLS YOU’LL IMPROVE
- Speaking: Clear pronunciation and natural conversational flow
- Listening: Understand natural conversations and diverse accents
- Writing: Clear, accurate phrasing and grammar
- Reading: Comprehension and everyday vocabulary

FOCUS ON YOUR GOALS
- Travel: Learn useful phrases and local expressions
- Career: Practise interviews, meetings and presentations
- Study: Build up grammar, vocabulary and listening skills
- Daily life: Order food, make plans and communicate naturally

FEEDBACK & PROGRESS TRACKING
- Personalised AI pronunciation and grammar corrections
- Track progress with streaks, achievements and personalised lesson stats
- Short, efficient and engaging practice sessions
- Improve speaking, listening, writing and reading

WHY TALKPAL
- Boost your speaking and fluency with interactive learning modes: Chat Mode, Word Mode, Sentence Mode, Dialogue Mode, Call Mode, Roleplays, Characters, Debates, Photo Mode, and personalised AI-generated Courses tailored to your level and goals
- Join millions of learners and become a language learning champ. Download now and speak for real. Build your fluency with Talkpal — anywhere, anytime

COMPANY & FEEDBACK
- Share your feedback and suggestions at support@talkpal.ai — let’s make your language learning experience even better!

app_name: EduMate GH – GES AI Study App
description:
EduMate GH is Ghana's first AI-powered learning and teaching assistant built strictly for the GES curriculum – for both students and teachers.

FOR STUDENTS

Unlock your full academic potential with structured, AI-guided lessons fully aligned to the Ghana Education Service (GES) curriculum. EduMate GH categorizes lessons under strands and sub-strands for each subject, ensuring you learn exactly what's required.

Key Student Features:

Structured AI Lessons: Get well-organized lessons tailored by subject and sub-strand, 100% aligned with GES standards.

100+ Multiple Choice Quizzes: Test your understanding with real-time feedback on each sub-strand.

AI Tutor: Ask any question and get clear, accurate answers instantly.

BECE & WASSCE Past Questions: Practice paper 1 and get solved answers for paper 2 from 2016 to present.

Voice & Audio Learning Support: Students with visual impairments can ask questions by voice and listen to lessons or past questions using our Audio Read-Aloud feature.

Textbook Access: Browse and read official textbooks for your subjects directly in the app.

FOR TEACHERS

Empower your teaching with EduMate GH’s intelligent assistant and content tools. Whether you're in Basic School, JHS, or SHS, everything you need is in one place.

Key Teacher Features:

GES Curriculum Access: View detailed curriculum for every subject across all levels.

Prepared Lesson Notes & Textbooks: Ready-to-use resources for effective classroom delivery.

AI-Powered Teaching Assistant: Generate structured Lesson Notes, Exams, Assignments, and Quizzes. Simply choose a strand > sub-strand > indicators – EduMate handles the rest.

Local Language Support: Teach and learn in Ghanaian languages including Twi, Ewe, and Hausa.

Why EduMate GH?

Built for the GES Curriculum

Powered by AI, crafted for real classrooms

Fully accessible with voice and audio tools

Ideal for both remote and in-class learning

Supports inclusive education for students with disabilities

EduMate GH is the all-in-one AI learning hub for Ghanaian schools. Whether you're preparing for the BECE/WASSCE or planning your next lesson, EduMate makes teaching and learning smarter, faster, and easier.

Syllabus GH: 
● Your Ultimate Study & Teaching Partner for the New Curriculum

● Ace your exams and master every topic with SyllabusGH, the all-in-one educational app meticulously designed for students and teachers. 

● Get instant curriculum-aligned access to comprehensive lesson notes, engaging video lessons, an extensive library of past questions with detailed solutions, interactive quizzes, and dedicated resources, all in one intuitive platform.

Why Syllabus GH is Your Key to Success:
● Complete Offline Access: No internet? No problem. 
● Access all curricula, detailed notes, engaging videos, an immense past questions library, and interactive quizzes without needing a data connection after the initial download. 
● Study on the go, even in areas with limited or no connectivity.
● New Curriculum Alignment (with Old Syllabus for Reference)
● Syllabus GH provides the complete new Common Core Programme (CCP) curriculum, from KG to SHS, ensuring you have the most up-to-date content.

●Extensive Past Questions (Pasco) & Solutions: Crush your exams with a massive, up-to-date library of WAEC WASSCE, BECE, NABPTEX, and NVTI past questions for both Core and Elective subjects.  Each question comes with detailed, step-by-step solutions to help you understand the reasoning and improve your problem-solving skills.
● Interactive Quizzes for Self-Assessment: Test your knowledge and track your
progress with curriculum-aligned interactive quizzes for every topic. Receive
instant feedback and identify areas where you need to focus more.
● Downloadable PDFs: Easily save any lesson note, syllabus, or content as a PDF for convenient printing, sharing, and studying across all your devices.
● Dedicated Learner Resources: Access a wealth of supplementary materials
designed to enhance your learning journey, including study tips, exam strategies and revision guides.
●Your Essential Teaching Assistant: SyllabusGH is the perfect tool for teachers to prepare comprehensive lesson notes, access a rich repository of curriculum-aligned resources, generate practice questions, and ensure complete
alignment with education standards. Streamline your lesson planning and focus more on teaching.

● Covering Every Level of Education Curriculum:
We provide comprehensive, curriculum-aligned materials for every stage of learning:
Kindergarten (KG)
Primary School
Junior High School (JHS)
Senior High School (SHS)
Senior High Technical School (SHTS)
TVET Institutions
Pre-Tertiary Colleges

All Core & Elective Subjects Included (and Growing!):
Find detailed notes, videos, past questions, and quizzes for subjects including:
English Language (Core & Elective)
Mathematics (Core & Elective)
Integrated Science, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
Social Studies / Our World Our People
Information and Communications Technology (ICT)
Religious and Moral Education (R.M.E)
Ghanaian Languages (Asante Twi, Ga, Ewe, Fante, Dagbani, Dagaare, Kasem,
Gonja, Gurene)
Creative Arts
French
Business Management
Economics
Government
Literature in English
Elective Mathematics
General Knowledge in Art
Home Economics
Technical Skills
...and many more.

Ads free experience (Seamlessly navigate through the app without Ads distruptions)

Weekly: $2.49

Classroom is a free service for schools, non-profits and anyone with a personal Google Account. Classroom makes it easy for learners and instructors to connect – inside and outside of schools. Classroom saves time and paper, and makes it easy to create classes, distribute assignments, communicate and stay organised.

Classroom is designed to help teachers create, collect and mark assignments paperlessly, including time-saving features like the ability to automatically make a copy of a Google Document for each student. It also creates Drive folders for each assignment and for each student to help keep everyone organised.

Students can keep track of what's due on the Assignments page and begin working with just a click. Teachers can quickly see who has or hasn't completed the work, and provide direct, real-time feedback and marks from within Classroom.

With the mobile app for iOS, students and teachers can view their classes and communicate with their classmates in real time. Students can open their assignments and work on them right from their iPhone or iPad. Teachers can keep track of who has handed in work and mark the assignment – at school or on the go. Students and teachers receive notifications when they have new content in Classroom, so they are always up to date.

There are many benefits of using Classroom:

Easy to set up
Teachers can add students directly or share a code with their class to join. It takes just minutes to set up.

Saves time
The simple, paperless assignment workflow allows teachers to create, review and mark assignments quickly, all in one place.

Improves organisation
Students can see all of their assignments on an Assignments page, and all class materials (e.g., documents, photos and videos) are automatically filed into folders in Google Drive.

Enhances communication
Classroom allows teachers to send announcements and start class discussions instantly. Students can share resources with each other or provide answers to questions on the stream.

Secure
Like the rest of Google Workspace for Education services, Classroom contains no ads, and never uses your content or student data for advertising purposes.

Permissions notice:
Camera: Needed to allow the user to take photos or videos and post them to Classroom.
Microphone: Needed to enable audio capture for recording videos to be posted to Classroom.
Photos: Needed to allow the user to attach photos or videos to Classroom. Photos or videos posted to Classroom will be stored on Google servers in order to show them in Classroom.

TestBank keeps you on your toes. Become a better test taker, creating confidence in the materials learned.

• The order of the answers is always scrambled.
This forces you to read/understand each answer choice instead of remembering which answer is correct based on its order. 

• Your individual performance is tracked.
Your performance is displayed when you open the app, allowing you to track your progress and target your studies. TestBank tracks your cumulative performance, both overall and by subject area.

• Questions Seen Least
TestBank knows which questions you have seen/answered the least often. When you choose this option (it's the default option), the questions that you have seen the least number of times will display first.

• Questions Missed Most
TestBank tracks when you get a question incorrect. After using TestBank for a while, you can focus on the questions that you have missed most often.

The King James Version (KJV), commonly known as the Authorized Version (AV) or King James Bible (KJB), is an English translation of the Christian Bible for the Church of England begun in 1604 and completed in 1611. First printed by the King's Printer Robert Barker, this was the third translation into English to be approved by the English Church authorities. The first was the Great Bible commissioned in the reign of King Henry VIII, and the second was the Bishops' Bible of 1568. In January 1604, King James I convened the Hampton Court Conference where a new English version was conceived in response to the perceived problems of the earlier translations as detected by the Puritans, a faction within the Church of England.
James gave the translators instructions intended to guarantee that the new version would conform to the ecclesiology and reflect the episcopal structure of the Church of England and its belief in an ordained clergy. The translation was done by 47 scholars, all of whom were members of the Church of England. In common with most other translations of the period, the New Testament was translated from Greek, the Old Testament was translated from Hebrew text, while the Apocrypha were translated from the Greek and Latin. In the Book of Common Prayer (1662), the text of the Authorized Version replaced the text of the Great Bible – for Epistle and Gospel readings – and as such was authorized by Act of Parliament. By the first half of the 18th century, the Authorized Version was effectively unchallenged as the English translation used in Anglican and Protestant churches. Over the course of the 18th century, the Authorized Version supplanted the Latin Vulgate as the standard version of scripture for English speaking scholars. Today, the most used edition of the King James Bible, and often identified as plainly the King James Version, especially in the United States, closely follows the standard text of 1769, edited by Benjamin Blayney at Oxford.

Photomath is known worldwide for helping millions of learners to learn, practice, and understand maths – one step at a time. 

Scan any maths problem with the Photomath app to get step-by-step explanations with accurate solutions and a variety of teacher-approved methods. Maths is about the process, so Photomath breaks your problem into bite-sized steps to help you understand the “what” and “why” along with the “how.” Whether you’re learning basic arithmetic or advanced geometry, we’ll tackle it together, step by step. 

Why Photomath? 

Billions of maths problems: From primary school maths to advanced calculus and everything in between, Photomath can solve billions of maths problems—including word problems! Whether handwritten, in a textbook, or on a screen, Photomath is here to help you untangle your trickiest problem.

Step-by-step explanations: Maths isn’t just about an answer. It’s about every step along the way. That’s why Photomath breaks down each step, so you can *really* learn. Less guesswork = less stress, especially with our new Animated Steps, which show you the exact progression of a particular step. 

Expert-developed methods: Photomath’s educational content is centered around the learner’s experience, driven by the expertise of our own team of mathematicians and former maths teachers. 

Self-paced learning: Photomath’s instant support is like having a 24/7 virtual tutor. Checking your homework before dinner? Stuck on a problem at 2am? We can help. Follow our detailed steps, taking whatever time you need to review definitions, rationale, and more – all within the explanation.

Want to dive deeper and explore more ways to learn? Photomath Plus can get you there with custom Animated Tutorials, detailed Textbook Solutions, and more!
